Jinnō Shōtōki. pp. 140-141. ==Events of the Reiki era== * 715 (Reiki 1): In the 7th year of Gemmei's reign, the empress abdicated; and her daughter received the succession (senso).Brown, p. 271. Soon after, Empress Genshō's new role as empress is confirmed with ceremonies (sokui).Titsingh, p. 65; Varley, H. Paul. (1980). Jinnō Shōtōki, p. 44; a distinct act of senso is unrecognized prior to Emperor Tenji; and all sovereigns except Jitō, Yōzei, Go-Toba, and Fushimi have senso and sokui in the same year until the reign of Emperor Go-Murakami.
